Incomplete Marčenko-Pastur Distribution Function

Source: R/SignalExtractOptimalShrinkage.R
incMarPas.Rd

Computes the incomplete Marčenko-Pastur distribution function, which is used in estimating noise levels.

Usage

incMarPas(x0, beta, gamma)

Arguments

x0

A numeric value representing the lower limit of integration.

beta

A numeric value indicating the ratio of columns to rows in the data matrix.

gamma

A numeric value specifying the power to which the function should be raised during integration.

Value

A numeric value of the integrated Marčenko-Pastur function.

On this page
